rdf:Description.dc:title: The economics of conservation tillage in Alberta 1993
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Appleby, Terry.
Alberta. Alberta Agriculture, Food, and Rural Development. Production Economics Branch.

rdf:Description.dc:description: "An analysis of the costs and returns of conservation tillage systems during the five-year Systems Evaluation Program (1988-1992)" -- from cover.
